resources.string: Unable to connect to the Internet
You can modify the application language by accessing the language settings within your phone\'s system configuration.

Welcome to our electricity price calculator app! 

 Our app provides you with up-to-date electricity price information for the different regions in Norway. 

 With our easy-to-use interface, you can quickly access current and forecasted electricity price data, PricePulse shows the user the current electricity price and today's price per hour. It also calculates what it would cost to use different appliances for a given time. 

 Currently the app only calculates the price of usage to washing machine, oven, heater and shower. 

 Our app is optimized for both phone and tablet use. In addition to that, it supports Norwegian and English. 

 We hope you enjoy using our electricity price calculator app and that it helps you stay informed and prepared. 

 This app has been developed in collaboration with the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and as part of an exam assignment for IN2000 at the University of Oslo. 

 

 The project was undertaken by: 

 Kashmala H. Sheikh, Osman Ahmed, 

 Sakaria Ahmed, Sofia Ibn El Moujdi Troger, 

 Suleyman Boyar and Adam Hussainy"

The purpose of this app is to show the electricity price for a timeframe, and show the cost for common appliances during the different timeframes. 

 The home screen shows the current spot price for the user. 

 The appliances screen shows the price of using the appliance that was chosen as a graph or a table. The settings screen provides you the opportunity to change the region, and gives you important information about this application.
